message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $1,200,000. I am confident this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I agree that the product is valuable, but I'm working with a tighter budget. I could consider a price closer to  $850,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $925,000 for the product. This price reflects its high value and the benefits it offers to your business. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still ensuring a fair transaction for both parties.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $900,000 is the highest I can go. If you can meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
